article_title: Prediction: U.S., world economies will plod on in 2015
article_text:
Midland, MI (48640)

Today

Mixed clouds and sun with scattered thunderstorms. High 84F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening. Partly cloudy skies after midnight. Low 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: Keith A. Pretty and Timothy G. Nash

og.description: In 2014, the U.S. and global economy grew at a tepid pace with signs for both optimism and apprehension throughout the year. America ended 2014 in a similar fashion to
